short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browser SIP Phone is an WebRTC client which works using WebRTC & SIP protocol

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You can use it as a Soft Phone (VoIP)

## Features
* Make and get calls
* Phone Controls - HOLD / MUTE / STOP
* Call history
* Call notifications
* DTMF support
* Early media support
